а что по поводу лагов и багов да неее это точно не про эту игру, она полностью без багов и лагов и подбор лобби полностью исправен....(рофл)

Gruselig und immer wieder gut für zwischen durch 1-2 Runden zu spielen.
Nur als Killer habe ich bis jetzt immer kläglich versagt...
I bought some auric cells and it took my 10 dollars and i didnt get my cells fix the shop

สนุกดีครับ แต่กากไปหน่อย เกมหรอ! ไม่ใช่ กุเนี่ยกาก!!!!

Greatly recommend this game, its fun and hilarious if you can get some friends in, granted there are some bad players and killers in the game who take it way too seriously the fun and nice ones do overpower those, Game itself also has an amazing team behind it who do care of you and look to improving the game for better and not just leave you in the dark, this isnt just a one time play game as it has alot of characters and options for you to choose, if youre looking for a game where you can dillydally around and run around like a headless chicken laughing with your friends this will be it :)

Играл раньше не так много, как в последнее время, 168 часов - это сравнительно немного, однако достаточно, чтобы поделиться некоторыми впечатлениями. Да с 2016 года игра все еще болеет багами и полна разнообразных неожиданностей, после которых у вас на лице будет написано:"Да какого х@% происходит?!" Однако в целом игра может доставить удовольствие как начинающему игроку, так и опытному, сейчас еще и выживших, и перков, и маньяков стало куда больше, чем по три стандартных вначале. Как бы у меня с нее не горело, однако как в соло, так и с компанией можно получить от игры удовольствие. (Иногда встречаются милые маньяки - это странно, но забавно ^^)
Sure. It's fun. Matchmaking's not great and the wait times are often eye-poppingly long, but I don't know how that can really be fixed. Game itself's great though.
Unfair matches, toxic community, that's how this game works
игра норм только у меня баг типо я вернул деньги
Хит боксы у манов просто классные(НЕТ)

roda bugado na minha torradeira, mas tudo certo
consigo aproveitar esse jogo lindo mesmo assim
nunca fui fã de jogo de terror e etc, mas poder ter o papel de assassino é algo diferente e foda pra caramba
10/10 sem duvida
só podiam portar melhor pra torradeiras...
Still a very fun horror game especially with friends!

Esse é um dos melhores jogos online que ja joguei! 
Estou simplesmente viciado, é emocionante jogar tanto como killer quanto como survivor, parece simples e bobo a ideia de concertar gerador e fugir, mas jogando você vê que não é tão simples assim e como é massa! 
Mas nem tudo são flores, vejo 2 pontos negativos: 
1) O Jogo do Celular não tem relação com o jogo do PC, então tudo que eu tenho aqui na Steam não tenho na conta do celular (mas no celular é free, então é uma boa experiencia pra quem quer ver como jogo funciona antes de comprar pro PC) 
2) As vezes demora um pouco as partidas, não sei porque, principalmente como assassino, ja fiquei 4/5 minutos esperando uma partida começar, isso é um pouco chato, mas quando a partida começa é muito massa!

Tirando os pontos acima, acho o game perfeito e super recomendo!

the game is almost perfect the only thing that spoils the game is the toxic community, i had 4 hours of play then a guy came to talk to me to refund the game since it was my first game. but, i already play nancy 4 time and get the pilar, but i didnt get her comestic

Ein sehr gutes Horror-Multiplayerspiel mit viel Varriation und garantiertem Spaß. Es kann manchmal schwer sein, besonders wenn man neu ist, aber nach der Zeit und mit viel Übung wird es schon leichter fallen. Solange man das Spiel genießt und nicht zu ernst nimmt ist es ein tolles Erlebnis. Und denkt daran immer nett zu sein :)
Gra słaba chyba że wbijesz 1 rangę i zaczniesz się bawić i trollować innych
Love this game, such unique gameplay and it's so much fun when playing with your mates :)

Смешная игра,где тебя успеют полить с головы до ног гавном.

Плохо играешь- ЧМО
Убил всех за маньяка- гавноед,и самое главное ЧМО
Чтобы ты не делал-ты чмо,лох,гусь или утапок. А так игра топ

생존자로 플레이 할떄는 살인마로부터 도망가고 발전기를 수리해 탈출하는 그 긴장감과 심장박동등 공포와 긴장감을 고조시키는 사운드는 상당히 생존자 플레이어들에게 스릴감을 안겨주는 요소가 아닌가 싶습니다 살인마는 최대한 많은 생존자들이 탈출하지 못하도록 발전기 수리를 막고 생존자들을 갈고리에 걸어 엔티티라는 신에게 제물로 바친다는 참신한 소재가 마음에 들뿐만 아니라 살인마들 또한 영화나 드라마 구전속 괴물등과 같이 여러 커뮤니티에서 오마주하고 콜라보를 시도한다는 것또한 플레이어들에게 즐거움을 주는 요소가 아닌가 싶습니다
Melhor jogo de sobrevivente e assassino

Jest to bardzo fajna gra stale dostaję nową zawartość oraz ma dużą bazę graczy. Trochę szkoda, że nowe postacie trzeba kupić oddzielnie w sklepie steam lecz raczej mało osób uważa to za wielki minus. Jeżeli masz znajomych z którymi możesz w to grać, ta gra staje się jeszcze lepsza
ja ich würde dieses spiel anderen empfehlen aber ich finde es schade dass der multi killer glitch rausgenommen würde

During the quarantine on 2020 I decided to buy this game due to its players on streams seemed to have fun and enjoy their time playing. It was definitely one of my best acquisition. It is an enjoyable game and it deserves uprising. Of course it has some problems, but I'm sure you're gonna have fun more than stressing out yourself like on other games. Most of DBD community is very polite, helpful, smart and funny. No regrets at all
Good game, but developers need to fix bugs and balance the game.
游戏气氛和音乐非常到位，同时可以四人组队有一起开黑的乐趣。希望细节和画质在增加一下就更完美了，
16年刚出的时候买的，是爷的青春，真的很好玩，强烈安利！
its a fun game to play with friends and also alone
